title: Knowledge-Building Strategies in Online and Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Science education course for non-degree adult learners conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners will explain the process of systematically constructing scientific theories through inquiry-based collaboration.
Learners will refine their ideas based on peer feedback in online discussion platforms.
Learners will analyze and improve their learning strategies using metacognitive reflection journals.

resources: Science Domain OER (Open Educational Resources) Links
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
